# Data

```{r data}
hpd_sf <- st_read(here("data-raw", "berlin", "human_population_density_berlin_2019_3035", "human_population_density_berlin_2019_3035.gpkg"))

berlin_district <- st_read(here("data-raw", "berlin", "berlin_districts_2020_3035", "berlin_districts_2020_3035.gpkg"))

temp_ras <- raster(here("data-proc", "berlin", "template_raster_berlin_10m_2020_3035", "template_raster_berlin_10m_2020_3035.tif"))

temp_ras_1m <- raster::disaggregate(temp_ras, 10)

hpd_sf <- hpd_sf %>% 
  mutate(area = st_area(.)) %>% 
  mutate(ew_m2_2019 = ew2019/area)

hpd_ras_1m <- fasterize::fasterize(sf = hpd_sf,
                                   raster = temp_ras_1m,
                                   field = "ew_m2_2019")

hpd_ras_10m <- raster::aggregate(hpd_ras_1m, 10, fun = sum)

hpd_ras_10m[is.na(hpd_ras_10m)] <- 0

hpd_ras_10m_mask <- raster::mask(x = hpd_ras_10m, 
                                 mask = berlin_district,
                                 updatevalue = NA
                                 )
plot(hpd_ras_10m_mask)

create_meta_raster(hpd_ras_10m_mask, 
                   name = "human_population_density_raster_10m",
                   date = "2019",
                   epsg = "3035",
                   units = NA,
                   descr = "created from human population polygon, values in cells are population density per mÂ²",
                   source = here("data-raw", "berlin", "human_population_density_berlin_2019_3035", "human_population_density_berlin_2019_3035.gpkg"),
                   d_down = NA,
                   mod = "NAs (zero values) inside Berlin borders where set to 0",
                   path = "data-proc/berlin",
                   folder = TRUE)

writeRaster(clc_ras_10m_mask, here("data-proc", "berlin", "human_population_density_raster_10m_2019_3035", "human_population_density_raster_10m_2019_3035.tif"), overwrite = TRUE)
```
